2025-02-03.title: South Korean appeals court upholds acquittal of Samsung chief Lee
2025-02-03.description: SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — A South Korean appeals court on Monday upheld a lower court’s ruling that acquitted Samsung Electronics Chairman Lee Jae-yong of financial criminal charges over a contentious merger between Samsung affiliates that cemented his grip o…

2025-01-30.title: Samsung Gets Nvidia’s Nod on Less Advanced Version of AI Memory
2025-01-30.description: Samsung Electronics Co. has obtained approval to supply a version of its fifth-generation high-bandwidth memory chips to Nvidia Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.

2025-01-10.title: Samsung Bioepis and Teva Enter into a Strategic Partnership for Commercialization of EPYSQLI® (eculizumab-aagh) in the United States
2025-01-10.description: Marks a step forward in broadening treatment options for patients with paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH), atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome (aHUS) and generalized myasthenia gravis (gMG) in the U.S. Partnership supports Teva’s Pivot to Growth strateg…

2025-01-24.title: ASML Outlook Clouded by Intel, Samsung and China Chip Challenges
2025-01-24.description: After sending shockwaves through the semiconductor industry following a third-quarter earnings miss, scrutiny is building ahead of ASML Holding NV’s results next week with uncertainty over the spending plans of its top clients.

2025-01-22.title: Samsung banks on AI expansion to drive demand for S25 phones
2025-01-22.description: Samsung Electronics Co. is banking an AI overhaul and tweaked hardware designs will sell its new Galaxy S25 smartphones. Read here for more

2025-01-22.title: Samsung aims to turn its next generation of Galaxy smartphones into AI companions
2025-01-22.description: SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) — Samsung is injecting another dose of artificial intelligence into its next lineup of Galaxy smartphones, escalating an effort to simplify people’s lives while deepening their dependence on a device that accompanies them almost everywhe…

2025-01-23.title: Ex-Google, Meta execs building emotionally aware AI sales agents
2025-01-23.description: Former engineering leads from Google, Meta and Samsung have launched a startup to build emotionally aware AI sales agents. Read more here

2025-03-05.title: Samsung Mulls US Battery Plant Despite Trump Anti-EV Stance
2025-03-05.description: South Korea’s Samsung SDI Co. said it’s weighing the idea of another manufacturing plant in the US, signaling optimism about the market’s growth despite President Donald Trump rolling back subsidies for electric vehicles.

2025-03-05.title: Trump Puts Spotlight on South Korean ‘Higher-Than-China’ Tariffs
2025-03-05.description: President Donald Trump pointed to South Korea as a country with more unfair tariffs against American products than China, while slamming the handing out of subsidies for foreign chipmakers like Samsung Electronics Co.

2025-03-14.title: Samsung SDI to Sell $1.4 Billion Shares for Battery Plants
2025-03-14.description: Samsung SDI Co. will raise 2 trillion won ($1.4 billion) selling new shares to fund investments in US and European facilities, as the South Korean battery maker bets on long-term growth of the electric-vehicle industry.

2025-03-25.title: Han Jong-Hee: Samsung co-CEO dies at 63
2025-03-25.description: Samsung Electronics co-CEO Han Jong-Hee died from cardiac arrest on Tuesday, according to a spokesperson for the South Korean tech giant. Han was 63.
